0.1.name: wordpress/gravity-forms-stripe
0.1.description:
Stripe allows you to process credit cards directly on your site, securely and easily, without having to deal with merchant accounts, PCI-compliance, or PayPal. This Gravity Forms add-on integrates Stripe with your forms (adapted from the Gravity Forms Authorize.net Add-On).

This plugin is an add-on for the Gravity Forms plugin. Grab a license if you don't already have one - you'll thank me later :-)

You'll also need a Stripe account.

Requires WordPress 3.5, PHP 5.3, and Gravity Forms 1.7.2. Works with WordPress Multisite.

Current Features

  • One-time payments
  • Canadian Stripe accounts
  • Stripe + PayPal option on same form
  • *Recurring payments/subscriptions<
